Description: Interval with upper and lower bounds based on a single confidence value between 0-1 (typical=0.95)
Interval with upper and lower bounds based on percentiles between 0-1
Interval with upper and lower bounds based on values of sigma (where the mean of a distribution is sigma=0)
Transparency value for the lines bounding the interval shaded region between 0-1
Hex color string for the the lines bounding the interval shaded region
Line style for the lines bounding the interval shaded region {‘-’, ‘--’, ‘-.’, ‘:’}
Width of the lines bounding the interval shaded region in pixels
Transparency value for the interval shaded region fill between 0-1
Hex color string for the interval shaded region fill
